title: [1.14.4] 自定义刷怪笼生物的自定义装备问题
author: 阡喏
txt_content: /give @p minecraft:spawner{RequiredPlayerRange:5,SpawnRange:3,SpawnCount:2,MaxNearbyEntities:4,MinSpawnDelay:160,Delay:200,MaxSpawnDelay:240,BlockEntityTag:{SpawnData:{DeathLootTable:"entities/1_zombie",ArmorItems:[{},{},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"[{\\"text\\":\\" 皮革外套\\",\\"color\\":\\"dark_green\\",\\"bold\\":false,\\"italic\\":false,\\"underlined\\":false,\\"strikethrough\\":false,\\"obfuscated\\":false}]",Lore:["{\\"text\\":\\"普通僵尸身上的皮革外套\\",\\"color\\":\\"dark_green\\",\\"bold\\":false,\\"italic\\":false,\\"underlined\\":false,\\"strikethrough\\":false,\\"obfuscated\\":false}"],color:3030538}}},{}],id:"minecraft:zombie"},SpawnPotentials:[{Weight:1,Entity:{DeathLootTable:"entities/1_zombie",ArmorItems:[{},{},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"[{\\"text\\":\\" 皮革外套\\",\\"color\\":\\"dark_green\\",\\"bold\\":false,\\"italic\\":false,\\"underlined\\":false,\\"strikethrough\\":false,\\"obfuscated\\":false}]",Lore:["{\\"text\\":\\"普通僵尸身上的皮革外套\\",\\"color\\":\\"dark_green\\",\\"bold\\":false,\\"italic\\":false,\\"underlined\\":false,\\"strikethrough\\":false,\\"obfuscated\\":false}"],color:3030538}}},{}],id:"minecraft:zombie"}}]}} 1复制代码用MC百科生成的指令，刷怪笼中僵尸的自定义装备的描述掉下来后没了，指令哪出问题了？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:

这样试试

lore 里面竟然能用 json 了吗
